ProductInfo.Features:
Built-in 1/3" Sony Super HAD CCD, Color DSP, Horizontal high resolution 600 TV Lines.
20 IR Infrared LEDs illuminators for night vision, 65 ft (20m) IR range.
3.6mm fixed lens with wide view angle, 0 Lux (IR LED on)
Vandal-proof design, Multi-Axis for wall or ceiling mounting, weatherproof.
All in one IR dome security camera with cable. Not include power supply.
